title: Test Schedule Update
content: The math test has been rescheduled to next Friday due to the school assembly.

title: Homework Due Tomorrow
content: Please complete exercises 15-20 from Chapter 5. Late submissions will not be accepted.

title: Essay Submission Deadline
content: Final essays are due by 11:59 PM on Friday. Please submit through the online portal.

title: Class Cancellation
content: Class will be cancelled tomorrow due to teacher professional development. We will resume on Monday.
